name: nlmngp2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c1, cngp), wcel(c1, cnrg))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ NrmMod, c1 ∈ NrmGrp, c1 ∈ NrmRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c1, cngp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c1, cnrg))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cnrg), wcel(c1, cngp))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c1 ∈ NrmGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c1 ∈ NrmRing)
⊣ (c1 ∈ NrmRing → c1 ∈ NrmGrp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c1, cngp))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c1, cnrg))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cnrg), wcel(c1, cngp))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c1 ∈ NrmGrp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c1 ∈ NrmRing)
⊣ (c1 ∈ NrmRing → c1 ∈ NrmGrp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c1, cnrg))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c1, cngp))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cnrg), wcel(c1, cngp))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmMod → c1 ∈ NrmGrp)
⊣ (c1 ∈ NrmRing → c1 ∈ NrmGrp)
⊣ c1 =(Scalar ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnlm), wcel(c1, cngp))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(csca, c0))

comment: The scalar component of a left module is a normed group. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
